summary: Just a small resource of a blue and white canine retexture, like Aylied, and a brown and black retexture. They work as wolves and huskies.
descriptionHtml:
Just a small resource of a blue and white canine retexture, like Aylied, and a brown and black retexture. They work as wolves and huskies.

I made them for a project I'm working on that probably won't be finished for a while, so I figured people might get some use out of them. Right now they don't replace the in game textures of wolves and huskies, they are separate from them so if you want them as replacers you'll just have to rename the textures to what you want. Both textures work on either the vanilla wolf or husky mesh from dawnguard.

The AyliedÂ texture does have a blue mouth, tongue and teeth, but it's varying shades of blue and greenish blue. Overall, I think they would look nice in unnatural places.

Use for whatever you'd like! That's why I uploaded them. Just credit me.
author: Wolflady500
